First on CNN: Biden taps new WH counsel amid special counsel probe, GOP investigations  —  President Joe Biden has tapped Ed Siskel, the former White House attorney who helped manage the Obama White House's response to the Benghazi and Solyndra investigations, to serve as his next White House counsel.

Trump's bond set for $200,000 in Fulton County  —  X  —  Former President Donald Trump was granted a $200,000 bond on Monday ahead of the Republican's expected surrender at the Fulton County jail.  —  Under the terms of the consent bond order, Trump can't perform any acts of witness intimidation …

John Eastman Statement Upon Self-Surrender in Fulton County  —  I am here today to surrender to an indictment that should never have been brought.  It represents a crossing of the Rubicon for our country, implicating the fundamental First Amendment right to petition the government for redress of grievances.
